scripts.generate-json: cd ./tools/testdocs-cli; npm run build;  node ./dist/cli.js gendocs json ../../working/source-files ../../json-docs --cfg ./config.json
scripts.validate: cd ./tools/testdocs-cli; npm run build; node ./dist/cli.js validate  ../../json-docs/full-test-suite.json
scripts.generate-html-clean: cd ./tools/testdocs-cli; npm run build; node ./dist/cli.js gendocs json ../../json-docs ../../json-docs --cfg ./config.json; node ./dist/cli.js gendocs html ../../json-docs/full-test-suite.json ../../docs/index.html
scripts.generate-markdown-clean: cd ./tools/testdocs-cli; npm run build;  node ./dist/cli.js gendocs json ../../working/source-files/ ../../json-docs --cfg ./config.json; node ./dist/cli.js gendocs markdown ../../json-docs/full-test-suite.json ../../docs/ReadMe.md
